title: JAM / TOMMY
description: At the plaza, near Kim's Kineema you may talk to an anxious truck driver. The man's come to stretch his legs. Here you will find information on: traffic jam, the closed gates, the other truck drivers, FALN. + Learn some background on the geography of Le Caillou. Possibly acquire one piece of the FALN clothing set. (Includes poetry white check.)

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: "Out of old habit he still snaps his..."
dialogueTree.text: Out of old habit he still snaps his fingers at you -- but then stops immediately, realizing what he's done. He does not want to talk to you.

links.title: Empathy: "Today, tomorrow, *ever*."
links.text: Today, tomorrow, *ever*.

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Stuck in the rain in a traffic jam..."
dialogueTree.text: "Stuck in the rain in a traffic jam, man. What's on your mind?"

links.title: You: ""I met the lady driver, on my inves..."
links.text: "I met the lady driver, on my investigation -- she's called Ruby."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Okay..." He seems a little apprehe..."
links.text: "Okay..." He seems a little apprehensive.

links.title: Drama: "Is it... *wise* to share informatio..."
links.text: Is it... *wise* to share information about the case like this, sire?

links.title: Suggestion: "Telling him is a REALLY bad idea."
links.text: Telling him is a REALLY bad idea.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant throws you a quick g..."
links.text: The lieutenant throws you a quick glance.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "What are you doing?"
links.text: What are you doing?

links.title: You: ""She shot herself.""
links.text: "She shot herself."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: Drama: "He cannot believe it."
links.text: He cannot believe it.

links.title: You: ""I'm very sorry. It was my fault.""
links.text: "I'm very sorry. It was my fault."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Sorry?" His eyes grow wide and he..."
links.text: "Sorry?" His eyes grow wide and he hyperventilates. "Is she *dead*? Don't tell me she's..."

links.title: Empathy: "Dead because of *me*?"
links.text: Dead because of *me*?

links.title: Endurance: "You've given him a panic attack. He..."
links.text: You've given him a panic attack. He's ill-equipped to deal with it.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Look, man, fuck off, okay? Fuck of..."
links.text: "Look, man, fuck off, okay? Fuck off and let me have a panic attack. I don't need to know about this shit anymore. I can't talk to cops any more..."

links.title: Volition: "He means it. This is the end of him..."
links.text: He means it. This is the end of him talking to you.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go.""
links.text: "Let's go."

links.title: Empathy: "The lieutenant is too tired to be c..."
links.text: The lieutenant is too tired to be cross with you, he just wants to go.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I *told* you not to go after her!..."
links.text: "I *told* you not to go after her! I TOLD you." He's hyperventilating. "What happened? Is she... is she..."

links.title: Empathy: "*Dead*? He can't say it..."
links.text: *Dead*? He can't say it...

links.title: Endurance: "You've given him a panic attack. He..."
links.text: You've given him a panic attack. He's ill-equipped to deal with it.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Don't tell me. Just back off and d..."
links.text: "Don't tell me. Just back off and don't talk to me again, okay? I can't talk to cops anymore. I can't be involved in this shit. "

links.title: Volition: "He cleans his hands of it. It's too..."
links.text: He cleans his hands of it. It's too much.

links.title: You: ""She was distraught. It... just hap..."
links.text: "She was distraught. It... just happened."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Just *happened*?" His eyes grow wi..."
links.text: "Just *happened*?" His eyes grow wide and he hyperventilates. "Is she *dead*? Don't tell me she's..."

links.title: You: ""I absolutely fucked up. I shouldn'..."
links.text: "I absolutely fucked up. I shouldn't have gone after her."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: "His eyes grow wide and he hypervent..."
links.text: His eyes grow wide and he hyperventilates. "Is she *dead*? Don't tell me she's..."

links.title: You: ""She's alive. She shot herself in t..."
links.text: "She's alive. She shot herself in the leg trying to escape." (Lie)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""God damn, this shit is too intense..."
links.text: "God damn, this shit is too intense for me..." He looks at his feet, steadying his breath. "I don't wanna know, man. I don't wanna know if she even got away..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: "That breath of his isn't calming do..."
links.text: That breath of his isn't calming down. "Man, I need to take a breath here, excuse me..."

links.title: Endurance: "You've given him a minor panic atta..."
links.text: You've given him a minor panic attack. He needs to deal with it.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right. That's enough sharing d..."
links.text: "All right. That's enough sharing details. Let's go."

links.title: Empathy: "The lieutenant is too tired to be c..."
links.text: The lieutenant is too tired to be cross with you, he just wants to get back to it.

links.title: Empathy: "He cannot believe it."
links.text: He cannot believe it.

links.title: You: ""She slipped away, don't worry" (Li..."
links.text: "She slipped away, don't worry" (Lie)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Whooh... good on her. And good on..."
links.text: "Whooh... good on her. And good on *you* too -- better focus your efforts on the bad guys. Mercs and such. Plenty of baddies to go around..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""And she didn't do it, believe me...."
links.text: "And she didn't do it, believe me. If it's something *bad* then she didn't do it. Didn't know her for long but I know people."

links.title: Empathy: "He's relieved."
links.text: He's relieved.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""All right. That's enough sharing d..."
links.text: "All right. That's enough sharing details about the investigation for one day."

links.title: You: ""She slipped away.""
links.text: "She slipped away."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Whooh... good on her. And good on..."
links.text: "Whooh... good on her. And good on *you* too -- better focus your efforts on the bad guys. Mercs and such. Plenty of baddies to go around..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""And she didn't do it -- believe me..."
links.text: "And she didn't do it -- believe me. If it's something *bad* then she didn't do it. Didn't know her for long but I know people."

links.title: You: ""I let her go. She didn't do anythi..."
links.text: "I let her go. She didn't do anything."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Whooh... good on her. And good on..."
links.text: "Whooh... good on her. And good on *you* too, my man. That's..." He looks for the words...

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""*Merciful*. Downright merciful --..."
links.text: "*Merciful*. Downright merciful -- you cops keep exercising *that* muscle and people will be more willing to cooperate, you know."

links.title: Empathy: "He's clearly relieved."
links.text: He's clearly relieved.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, that's it. Can't share any m..."
links.text: "Yeah, that's it. Can't share any more."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""That's probably for the best. You..."
links.text: "That's probably for the best. You keep your job to yourself -- with a job like yours, you *have* to."

links.title: You: ""I heard that one of the drivers is..."
links.text: "I heard that one of the drivers is a woman, but I haven't seen her around. Do you know this *lady driver*?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I don't want to talk about that......"
links.text: "I don't want to talk about that..." He shifts around, suddenly uncomfortable, then looks away.

links.title: Suggestion: "This guy knows Ruby, no doubt. Just..."
links.text: This guy knows Ruby, no doubt. Just play dumb for now. Get everything out of him you can.

links.title: You: ""Why, do you know something? What i..."
links.text: "Why, do you know something? What is it?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Man, I was hoping it isn't gonna b..."
links.text: "Man, I was hoping it isn't gonna be her..." He bites his lip. "All I can say is -- she isn't around here anymore; she isn't some evil drug-trafficker; and I don't know where she is."

links.title: You: ""I don't mean to pry, but I need yo..."
links.text: "I don't mean to pry, but I need your help -- she may be involved with the drug business."

links.title: You: ""I don't mean to pry, but I need yo..."
links.text: "I don't mean to pry, but I need your help -- looks like she may be involved in drug trafficking."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Man, I was hoping she'd catch a br..."
links.text: "Man, I was hoping she'd catch a break." He shakes his head. "All I can say is: she isn't around here anymore. She isn't some mastermind evil-doer. And I don't know where she is."

links.title: You: ""I asked you who's conducting the d..."
links.text: "I asked you who's conducting the drug trade. You said you didn't *know*. Now you're saying you do."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I didn't, man -- I told you, I was..."
links.text: "I didn't, man -- I told you, I was *hoping* it's not her. That she wouldn't be mixed up in it."

links.title: Empathy: "He still is -- hoping. It's just wi..."
links.text: He still is -- hoping. It's just wishful thinking on his part, not trickery.

links.title: Drama: "It's true. We would have caught a l..."
links.text: It's true. We would have caught a lie. But... a *kind* heart is tricky.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Bah. Emotional rhetoric. He knew so..."
links.text: Bah. Emotional rhetoric. He knew something and he didn't share it with you. That's a *fact*.

links.title: You: ""Who is this person. What's her nam..."
links.text: "Who is this person. What's her name?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Thank god I *don't know*. People h..."
links.text: "Thank god I *don't know*. People here call her 'the lady driver.' She kept her name a secret. From me, too. Now I see why."

links.title: Drama: "Again -- not a lie as far as you ca..."
links.text: Again -- not a lie as far as you can tell.

links.title: You: ""Who is she to you?""
links.text: "Who is she to you?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""A friend? An acquaintance. I don't..."
links.text: "A friend? An acquaintance. I don't know... She was the only person in this damn jam I could talk to. She's someone I don't want to rat out to the law, okay?"

links.title: You: ""What does she look like?""
links.text: "What does she look like?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""A young-ish woman. Gruff, but... i..."
links.text: "A young-ish woman. Gruff, but... in a cool way."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What colour hair?""
links.text: "What colour hair?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Blue and violet, dyed." He answers..."
links.text: "Blue and violet, dyed." He answers reluctantly. "It was violet when she got here. Blue before she went."

links.title: Logic: "Then she may have dyed it again."
links.text: Then she may have dyed it again.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Maybe she dyed it *red*? Titus said..."
links.text: Maybe she dyed it *red*? Titus said Ruby's hair is red...

links.title: You: ""What colour hair?""
links.text: "What colour hair?"

links.title: You: ""When did she leave?" (Move on.)"
links.text: "When did she leave?" (Move on.)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Damn, I don't wanna..." He looks y..."
links.text: "Damn, I don't wanna..." He looks you straight in the eye. "Please just let it go. Whatever she did, it can't be that bad. She's not a bad person, I know that much."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We can't just *let it go*. It's pa..."
links.text: "We can't just *let it go*. It's part of a police investigation."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""That's how it always is with you,..."
links.text: "That's how it always is with you, isn't it? All part of the investigation..." He shakes his head. "The girl's *troubled* -- if you hunt her down, she may not survive it. I can't have that on my conscience."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It won't come to that. We won't pu..."
links.text: "It won't come to that. We won't pursue her on this. This is information only."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I don't believe you.""
links.text: "I don't believe you."

links.title: You: ""Believe us. It really is.""
links.text: "Believe us. It really is."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I just can't, man. I'm not *naive*.""
links.text: "I just can't, man. I'm not *naive*."

links.title: You: ""You said she's *troubled* -- how?""
links.text: "You said she's *troubled* -- how?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""She's got the *darkness* in her. T..."
links.text: "She's got the *darkness* in her. That young person's darkness when you think it's all over. And you're looking for a way *out*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""She shared this with you?""
links.text: "She shared this with you?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yes, which is why I don't want to..."
links.text: "Yes, which is why I don't want to *snitch* on her."

links.title: You: ""It's not *snitching*. It's just a..."
links.text: "It's not *snitching*. It's just a few *questions*."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's snitching, man. I know what i..."
links.text: "It's snitching, man. I know what it is."

links.title: You: ""C'mon, man. Life is just a joke.""
links.text: "C'mon, man. Life is just a joke."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Maybe. But not *another* person's..."
links.text: "Maybe. But not *another* person's life."

links.title: You: ""I was told *everyone's* afraid of..."
links.text: "I was told *everyone's* afraid of her. You're not?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I heard the rumours. I saw the oth..."
links.text: "I heard the rumours. I saw the others drivers looking at me *strange* when we talked. And she told me too -- that she's had a violent life. But I wasn't afraid of her, more like *for* her."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Did this violent life include drug..."
links.text: "Did this violent life include drug trafficking?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Well..." He sighs. "It looks like..."
links.text: "Well..." He sighs. "It looks like it did *now* -- but we didn't talk about that. We talked about life, you know. She talked about her mind..."

links.title: You: ""Hold on. Her mind?""
links.text: "Hold on. Her mind?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""The way it worked. The trouble it..."
links.text: "The way it worked. The trouble it was giving her."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "The pain it was causing her."
links.text: The pain it was causing her.

links.title: You: ""When she left, did she leave her l..."
links.text: "When she left, did she leave her lorry behind?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Fuck, man... Go grill someone else..."
links.text: "Fuck, man... Go grill someone else with these questions, okay? There are plenty of drivers here who couldn't stand her. Or were *afraid* of her. They'd be more than happy to rat her out."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "He's right, there are other options..."
links.text: He's right, there are other options -- the raceman, for one.

links.title: Logic: "Hmh... the grey haired woman. Maybe..."
links.text: Hmh... the grey haired woman. Maybe she knows something?

links.title: Logic: "One of them you haven't even questi..."
links.text: One of them you haven't even questioned yet. Maybe the third driver knows something?

links.title: Rhetoric: "Wait. This guy says they're friends..."
links.text: Wait. This guy says they're friends, then *acquaintances*. And he's okay with others ratting her out?

links.title: Empathy: "Push Tommy and it will break his he..."
links.text: Push Tommy and it will break his heart -- and his spirit. Don't expect you to be pals.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Now is not a time to focus on feeli..."
links.text: Now is not a time to focus on feelings -- you need that info, son.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's right here. The answer is *rig..."
links.text: It's right here. The answer is *right* here. You just need to ask him. C'mon -- do it!

links.title: You: ""Did this violent life include drug..."
links.text: "Did this violent life include drug trafficking?"

links.title: You: ""She shared this with you?""
links.text: "She shared this with you?"

links.title: You: ""I can't just 'let it go', it's par..."
links.text: "I can't just 'let it go', it's part of a police investigation."

links.title: You: ""Okay, let's change the subject the..."
links.text: "Okay, let's change the subject then."

links.title: You: ""I've changed my mind about your fr..."
links.text: "I've changed my mind about your friend the lady driver..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""What?" He looks up. "But I *told*..."
links.text: "What?" He looks up. "But I *told* you she's my friend! Please don't make me give her up, detective. Get someone else. There's a *ton* of drivers here..."

links.title: You: ""So you're alright with others ratt..."
links.text: "So you're alright with others ratting her out. You just don't want *your* hands dirty?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Fine. I don't want to be a butcher..."
links.text: "Fine. I don't want to be a butcher. And I don't want to be a knight either. I just wanna be a person who can sleep at night. A little fame wouldn't hurt too."

links.title: You: ""Put yourself in my shoes. I need t..."
links.text: "Put yourself in my shoes. I need this for another investigation too -- it's important, I can't blow it."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""You're not gonna put a bullet in y..."
links.text: "You're not gonna put a bullet in your head if you blow it, are you? 'Cause she's on the *edge*, man."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "I wouldn't be so sure, Tommy."
links.text: I wouldn't be so sure, Tommy.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Imagine it. An explosion. Of *stars..."
links.text: Imagine it. An explosion. Of *stars*. Good bye world of men, money and machines...

links.title: You: ""She's a suspect and I need you to..."
links.text: "She's a suspect and I need you to tell me where she is. Or I can't finish the investigation." (Force Tommy.)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I... I thought you were a differen..."
links.text: "I... I thought you were a different kind of cop." Something breaks in him as he stares into your eyes.

links.title: Empathy: "The realization that you've used hi..."
links.text: The realization that you've used his friendliness and good will for your own ends.

links.title: Volition: "Remember, you're doing it for the b..."
links.text: Remember, you're doing it for the bigger investigation -- this is important. Relax. Ask.

links.title: You: ""*Where* is the lady driver?""
links.text: "*Where* is the lady driver?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Here." He takes a keyring from his..."
links.text: "Here." He takes a keyring from his pocket -- then looks at it before giving it to you. In silence...

links.title: Interfacing: "The keys to a motor lorry. Pretty c..."
links.text: The keys to a motor lorry. Pretty complex. Looks like a chain lock.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: "Then he gives them to you. "Her lor..."
links.text: Then he gives them to you. "Her lorry is still here. Down, past the statue of Filippe," he waves toward the monument. "The cabin is green. You can get in there with these. That's all I know."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""When did she leave?""
links.text: "When did she leave?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Last Friday." He blinks, his eyes..."
links.text: "Last Friday." He blinks, his eyes half-empty now.

links.title: You: ""When did she leave?""
links.text: "When did she leave?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Last Friday." He blinks, his eyes..."
links.text: "Last Friday." He blinks, his eyes half-empty now.

links.title: You: ""Anything else? Like where she is n..."
links.text: "Anything else? Like where she is now?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""No. I don't know.""
links.text: "No. I don't know."

links.title: You: ""And why did you have the keys?""
links.text: "And why did you have the keys?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""She left them to me. Because she t..."
links.text: "She left them to me. Because she trusted me... So I can get it out of the way when the jam breaks loose. Otherwise..." He doesn't finish the sentence.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The other drivers would have to to..."
links.text: "The other drivers would have to tow it, or break in, to get the machines moving." He nods.

links.title: Logic: "If they break in they would find wh..."
links.text: If they break in they would find what's hidden inside? Something incriminating?

links.title: Logic: "The other drivers would have to bre..."
links.text: The other drivers would have to break in there -- to get the machines moving. And they would find what's hidden inside? Something *incriminating*?

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry I had to do this.""
links.text: "I'm sorry I had to do this."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I bet you are.""
links.text: "I bet you are."

links.title: Empathy: "And he's sorry he couldn't be what..."
links.text: And he's sorry he couldn't be what he wants to be -- a good person. His last line, his revenge on the world.

links.title: You: ""One more thing. About something el..."
links.text: "One more thing. About something else."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Nah. I need to think my own though..."
links.text: "Nah. I need to think my own thoughts now. Pray forgiveness for my sins. Go check your cabin..." He adds quietly: "I hope it gets you something. Helps someone."

links.title: You: ""Let's go Kim." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Let's go Kim." [Leave.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He turns to the man before you leav..."
links.text: He turns to the man before you leave. "Thank you for your cooperation, sir. I know it was hard. But you did the right thing."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""You don't *really* think so.""
links.text: "You don't *really* think so."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I really do. If I didn't, I wouldn..."
links.text: "I really do. If I didn't, I wouldn't be in the RCM. Take care, sir."

links.title: You: ""Thank you. I'll go to the cabin th..."
links.text: "Thank you. I'll go to the cabin then." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""Fine, I will drop the matter for n..."
links.text: "Fine, I will drop the matter for now." (Find another way.)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Thank you, friend." He sighs. It's..."
links.text: "Thank you, friend." He sighs. It's a big sigh of relief. "Wow, this makes me feel like I should pick up smoking again... Would help with my rhymes too."

links.title: You: ""Fine, I will drop the matter *agai..."
links.text: "Fine, I will drop the matter *again*." (Find another option)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Whooh. Almost gave me a heart atta..."
links.text: "Whooh. Almost gave me a heart attack..." He sighs with relief. "Yeah, I *really* need to start smoking again."

links.title: You: ""Got any smokes on you?""
links.text: "Got any smokes on you?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Nope. Don't smoke." He nods toward..."
links.text: "Nope. Don't smoke." He nods toward the big lorry behind him...

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Some of the other drivers do, thou..."
links.text: "Some of the other drivers do, though. There's still a few around, waiting for the Jam to disperse. Or waiting for the sweet release of death."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You really need them smokes. Need '..."
links.text: You really need them smokes. Need 'em! Gotta get some. You sure he's not lying to you? You can't trust a lorryman.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Hey -- isn't he, like smoking right..."
links.text: Hey -- isn't he, like smoking right now? The smell is in the air.

links.title: You: ""You *lying* to me? Being all sting..."
links.text: "You *lying* to me? Being all stingy with the smokes?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Man, relax. I quit, been clean for..."
links.text: "Man, relax. I quit, been clean for some time. There are some commitments you have to honour." He looks at you with compassion in his eyes.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's a bad habit. You ought to qui..."
links.text: "It's a bad habit. You ought to quit, too."

links.title: Empathy: "He's seen your kind before. As a lo..."
links.text: He's seen your kind before. As a lorry driver he's familiar with every addiction, compulsion, and self-destructive habit known to a man.

links.title: You: ""Did I ask for your *opinion?*""
links.text: "Did I ask for your *opinion?*"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""No, my man, you asked for my cigar..."
links.text: "No, my man, you asked for my cigarettes." There's sadness in his voice; he doesn't seem offended, though.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Anything else I can help you with?""
links.text: "Anything else I can help you with?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I can quit any time I want.""
links.text: "Yeah, I can quit any time I want."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Okay, man, I believe you." He give..."
links.text: "Okay, man, I believe you." He gives you a funny look.

links.title: You: ""You've got a point, but now is not..."
links.text: "You've got a point, but now is not a good time to quit. I've got a murder to solve."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's never a good time to quit." H..."
links.text: "It's never a good time to quit." He shakes his head. "You just gotta sit it out, friend."

links.title: You: ""You're right. I should use this as..."
links.text: "You're right. I should use this as an opportunity to start *anew*."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Right, man -- *anew*." He adds wit..."
links.text: "Right, man -- *anew*." He adds with a smile and a nod: "The phoenix at the traffic jam."

links.title: You: ""Sure you smoke. You're smoking rig..."
links.text: "Sure you smoke. You're smoking right now."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Okay..." His eyes smile. "But this..."
links.text: "Okay..." His eyes smile. "But this is my last one. And it's a bad habit. You should quit before both of us have lung cancer."

links.title: Endurance: "Are you sure you don't *already* ha..."
links.text: Are you sure you don't *already* have lung cancer?

links.title: You: ""Guess I'll ask around then.""
links.text: "Guess I'll ask around then."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""You could also check the kiosque d..."
links.text: "You could also check the kiosque down the street. Frittte." He points towards the harbour. "With three t-s. Revachol is weird..."

links.title: Perception: "Yup. Nothing wrong with that statem..."
links.text: Yup. Nothing wrong with that statement. Your senses have nothing to add. You'll have to ask around elsewhere.

links.title: You: ""Care to spare some change for a wo..."
links.text: "Care to spare some change for a working stiff?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Huh?" Sudden financial duties snap..."
links.text: "Huh?" Sudden financial duties snap him out of his daze. "Oh. No, I ain't got any money. They don't want to pay for unfinished work."

links.title: You: ""'They' who?""
links.text: "'They' who?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""The bosses, man.""
links.text: "The bosses, man."

links.title: You: ""Makes sense. First work, then pay.""
links.text: "Makes sense. First work, then pay."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Makes sense? It sucks is what it d..."
links.text: "Makes sense? It sucks is what it does."

links.title: Suggestion: "Maybe don't tell people the people..."
links.text: Maybe don't tell people the people they don't like are actually right...

links.title: You: ""I don't know who these *bosses* th..."
links.text: "I don't know who these *bosses* think they are, but that sounds like a good arrangement -- for them."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah, it sure ain't good for me --..."
links.text: "Yeah, it sure ain't good for me -- or you. I'd spare a coin or two for a city cop down on his luck. If I had, say, *four* myself."

links.title: You: ""So you're broke. Got it. What else..."
links.text: "So you're broke. Got it. What else did I have to ask here..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Dunno. Whatcha need?""
links.text: "Dunno. Whatcha need?"

links.title: You: ""Tell me more about this... *strike..."
links.text: "Tell me more about this... *strike*."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's like... whatever's going on o..."
links.text: "It's like... whatever's going on over at the docks. Workers got a blockade set up. Making demands. No way in or out."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Going on strike would probably help..."
links.text: Going on strike would probably help you dodge a bullet or two.

links.title: You: ""Maybe *I* should go on strike...""
links.text: "Maybe *I* should go on strike..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Maybe you should. Cops don't get p..."
links.text: "Maybe you should. Cops don't get paid much and the hours are long. Plus, you can get shot. Why not?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The RCM is a self-managing organiz..."
links.text: "The RCM is a self-managing organization that operates on donations. We promote our own leaders. It would be like striking against your own... mother."

links.title: You: ""I don't know my mother -- but I'd..."
links.text: "I don't know my mother -- but I'd go on strike against her too. For my rights."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay." The lieutenant's face betra..."
links.text: "Okay." The lieutenant's face betrays little reaction. "But do continue. You were asking about the strike."

links.title: You: ""Hmm. I guess you've got a point th..."
links.text: "Hmm. I guess you've got a point there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes -- but do continue. You were a..."
links.text: "Yes -- but do continue. You were asking about the strike."

links.title: You: ""No -- *your* mother.""
links.text: "No -- *your* mother."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't think you understand how t..."
links.text: "I don't think you understand how that joke goes, but -- do continue. You were asking about the strike."

links.title: You: ""What's the Union demanding?""
links.text: "What's the Union demanding?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Some pretty wild stuff, I hear. Li..."
links.text: "Some pretty wild stuff, I hear. Like a giant new power-crane and half the company? I forget *what* exactly. Good on them, I guess..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I've heard talk there's a company..."
links.text: "I've heard talk there's a company rep in town too. Like... a strike negotiator type. They'd know what's up. Precise demands and so on."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Ah, yes. From the Wild Pines...."..."
links.text: "Ah, yes. From the Wild Pines...." He takes a note. "We'll meet her soon enough, I'm sure."

links.title: You: ""What do you think the company want..."
links.text: "What do you think the company wants?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""They want to keep that money flowi..."
links.text: "They want to keep that money flowing in, my man." He makes a 'ka-ching' sound.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He doesn't blame them. But he's not..."
links.text: He doesn't blame them. But he's not on their side, that's for sure.

links.title: You: ""Anything else I should know?" (Con..."
links.text: "Anything else I should know?" (Conclude.)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Anything else?" He thinks. "Yeah,..."
links.text: "Anything else?" He thinks. "Yeah, this ain't really my area of expertise. I just do my job and get paid. I have things to do and places to be. All of us do."

links.title: You: ""All of who?""
links.text: "All of who?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Us lorry drivers. Camionneurs. A f..."
links.text: "Us lorry drivers. Camionneurs. A few still hang around here waiting for this mess to end. Most have scurried off somewhere. To get drunk, or high. Or laid." He smiles awkwardly. "Not that I blame 'em, really."

links.title: You: ""Not you?""
links.text: "Not you?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Not my thing. Chasin' transient pl..."
links.text: "Not my thing. Chasin' transient pleasures is a drag these days. I prefer the examined life now -- thinkin', reflectin', observin'." He glances down the road toward the horizon, a glint of... something in his eyes.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "What's better than chasing transien..."
links.text: What's better than chasing transient pleasures? The more transient the better! When one's ended you can get on to the *next* one.

links.title: Composure: "He tries his best to look nonchalan..."
links.text: He tries his best to look nonchalant, but there's a rigidity in him, as if trying to conceal something warm and deep beneath a cool exterior.

links.title: You: ""Know anything about the dead man?..."
links.text: "Know anything about the dead man? The one hanging behind the hostel there?" (Point at the yard.)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""He ain't one of us drivers -- I kn..."
links.text: "He ain't one of us drivers -- I know that. All accounted for. Otherwise, I haven't really asked about that. Been wastin' time right here. Keepin' busy."

links.title: Drama: "It's easy to see he's telling the t..."
links.text: It's easy to see he's telling the truth. He's kept his nose out of the dark stuff.

links.title: You: ""Busy -- with what?""
links.text: "Busy -- with what?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Analysin' the fundamental structur..."
links.text: "Analysin' the fundamental structural and psychological conditions of being stranded in the midst of a sea of motor lorries and their sad, despondent chauffeurs."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Ask for his conclusion."
links.text: Ask for his conclusion.

links.title: You: ""Wait, what?""
links.text: "Wait, what?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Nothing." He smiles. "I'm just mes..."
links.text: "Nothing." He smiles. "I'm just messing with you, man. Don't mind my idle verbosity."

links.title: You: ""And your conclusion?""
links.text: "And your conclusion?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""A sense of surprise there ain't mo..."
links.text: "A sense of surprise there ain't more bodies hanging from more trees."

links.title: You: ""Alright, never mind then.""
links.text: "Alright, never mind then."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: "The man taps his fingers rhythmical..."
links.text: The man taps his fingers rhythmically against his arm.

links.title: You: ""What are you hauling anyway?""
links.text: "What are you hauling anyway?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Oh, high-grade narcotics. Illegal..."
links.text: "Oh, high-grade narcotics. Illegal fire-arms. Stuff like that."

links.title: Authority: "Time to arrest him!"
links.text: Time to arrest him!

links.title: Rhetoric: "Relax, he's merely joking."
links.text: Relax, he's merely joking.

links.title: You: ""You're under arrest.""
links.text: "You're under arrest."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Hah, no. I'm joking, my man." He g..."
links.text: "Hah, no. I'm joking, my man." He grins. "FALN runs a nice, clean business. This haul of cargo is mostly sporting goods. You know, tracksuits and that kinda thing."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""They usually get shipped to Graad..."
links.text: "They usually get shipped to Graad and the Occident. Though we've been making headway in the Iilmaraan market lately."

links.title: You: ""So, nothing illegal then?""
links.text: "So, nothing illegal then?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Not unless they've illegalized spo..."
links.text: "Not unless they've illegalized sports equipment while I was on the road."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Never! They would never illegalize..."
links.text: Never! They would never illegalize sport. Sport is the most wholesome thing known to man.

links.title: You: ""That's your machine behind you?""
links.text: "That's your machine behind you?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""This rockin' beauty?" He points at..."
links.text: "This rockin' beauty?" He points at the lorry with his thumb. "Sure is, like a rash you can't get rid of. You interested in heavy duty cargo machinery?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A motor lorry, also called a *camio..."
links.text: A motor lorry, also called a *camion* on Caillou and neighbouring islands. This one looks roughed up enough to be some sort of a FALN rust-bucket, maybe the A-6?

links.title: You: ""That a FALN A-6 you got there?""
links.text: "That a FALN A-6 you got there?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Good eye, my man. Yup, she's an ol..."
links.text: "Good eye, my man. Yup, she's an old one, but reliable." He gives the side of the lorry a friendly knock. "Me and her spent a *long* time together."

links.title: Empathy: "There it is again -- a little touch..."
links.text: There it is again -- a little touch of sadness beneath his cool. He thinks he's spent too long in this lorry.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, these lorries are pretty nea..."
links.text: "Yeah, these lorries are pretty neat."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Neat -- for carrying large quantit..."
links.text: "Neat -- for carrying large quantities of cargo a long distance. These FALN tracksuits need to find their way to the kids way out in Uamrao and L'Iramburde somehow..."

links.title: You: ""Interested? Not really, I just ask..."
links.text: "Interested? Not really, I just asked because... I don't know, must be a cop reflex."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah, must be -- your job's to kno..."
links.text: "Yeah, must be -- your job's to know all those *little* things isn't it? While my job..." he pats the back of the lorry, "is to deliver tracksuit trousers."

links.title: You: ""Could I get one of those FALN trac..."
links.text: "Could I get one of those FALN tracksuits you're hauling?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""We're pals and all, but I can't ju..."
links.text: "We're pals and all, but I can't just freely hand out the merchandise. The bosses won't be happy."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "There's no denying it -- your body..."
links.text: There's no denying it -- your body *needs* to feel the touch of some good performance-wear.

links.title: You: ""Right. I had another question." (C..."
links.text: "Right. I had another question." (Conclude.)

links.title: You: ""Wicked. I've always wanted a frien..."
links.text: "Wicked. I've always wanted a friend in the underworld."

links.title: You: ""Okay. And what are you *actually*..."
links.text: "Okay. And what are you *actually* hauling?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Can't even get a few jokes past yo..."
links.text: "Can't even get a few jokes past you, my man." He grins. "I've got another haul of FALN cargo. Mostly sporting goods. Tracksuits and that kinda thing."

links.title: You: ""You seem like a man who knows abou..."
links.text: "You seem like a man who knows about *drugs*."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Ah, man, me and narcotics go way b..."
links.text: "Ah, man, me and narcotics go way back." He folds his hands behind his head and leans back. "Had some good times surfin' the psychic waves of my own consciousness, you know?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""But..." he pauses, letting the mem..."
links.text: "But..." he pauses, letting the memory dissipate. "Those days are behind me. There are other addictions in my life now. Why the inquiry, my man?"

links.title: Suggestion: "Just be straight with him."
links.text: Just be straight with him.

links.title: You: ""Do you finance those 'other addict..."
links.text: "Do you finance those 'other addictions' with drug trafficking?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Hey man, that's serious criminal t..."
links.text: "Hey man, that's serious criminal talk. Are you trying to pull some sort of an... entrapment thing on me?"

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Entrapment is a practice whereby an..."
links.text: Entrapment is a practice whereby an officer of the law induces a person to commit a criminal offence that the person would have otherwise been unlikely to commit. Usually through some trickery, persuasion or fraud.

links.title: You: ""Entrapment? What's that?""
links.text: "Entrapment? What's that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Entrapment is where a law officer..."
links.text: "Entrapment is where a law officer gets a person to commit a criminal offence they otherwise wouldn't commit. Often through some trickery or fraud."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yes, it's like... trying to trick..."
links.text: "Yes, it's like... trying to trick a person into doing something criminal that they'd never do."

links.title: You: ""I wouldn't do something like that!""
links.text: "I wouldn't do something like that!"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Then what are you trying to accomp..."
links.text: "Then what are you trying to accomplish?"

links.title: You: ""Hey, if it yields results?" (Shrug..."
links.text: "Hey, if it yields results?" (Shrug and give the thumbs up.)

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""So, you do realize entrapment does..."
links.text: "So, you do realize entrapment doesn't work if you announce you're going to do it in advance?"

links.title: You: ""Seems like a wonderful way to spic..."
links.text: "Seems like a wonderful way to spice up some boring cases."

links.title: You: ""What? No, of course not.""
links.text: "What? No, of course not."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: "He rubs his jaw. "Then what's your..."
links.text: He rubs his jaw. "Then what's your deal here?"

links.title: Suggestion: "So much for subtlety. Better get st..."
links.text: So much for subtlety. Better get straight to the point.

links.title: You: ""I need to get *high*. And I'm look..."
links.text: "I need to get *high*. And I'm looking for a dealer."

links.title: You: ""Let me be straight with you. I'm t..."
links.text: "Let me be straight with you. I'm trying to figure out who's smuggling drugs out of Terminal B."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant steps in: "We have a..."
links.text: The lieutenant steps in: "We have a credible lead, sir. Someone on this roundabout is waiting for a bulk shipment from the harbour -- to load it on their lorry and drive it to Jamrock."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Not me, man, no way. I don't need..."
links.text: "Not me, man, no way. I don't need any trouble. Shit's bad enough anyway. This jam's got folks up in arms and I'm afraid it's headed toward a conflagration."

links.title: You: ""Wait, then why are you still hangi..."
links.text: "Wait, then why are you still hanging around?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Gotta guard the stuff -- bosses do..."
links.text: "Gotta guard the stuff -- bosses don't look kindly on missing cargo. And it gives me time to work on my rhymes."

links.title: Conceptualization: "A rhyme-smith? This is quite credib..."
links.text: A rhyme-smith? This is quite credible -- it goes with his cadence and way of speaking.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Working on these 'rhymes' clearly l..."
links.text: Working on these 'rhymes' clearly leads to muscular atrophy. Make sure you don't get hooked on poetry.

links.title: You: ""Who do you think could be conducti..."
links.text: "Who do you think could be conducting the drug trade then?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Look, man, I try to stay away from..."
links.text: "Look, man, I try to stay away from the criminal underbelly of Revachol. I'm a guest here. You really need to find another man to probe with those questions."

links.title: Drama: "We wouldn't say he's lying, sire."
links.text: We wouldn't say he's lying, sire.

links.title: Empathy: "It's not a lie, it's... something e..."
links.text: It's not a lie, it's... something else. Impossible to say *what* at this point, but there's something in him. Some trepidation.

links.title: You: "What do you see in his eyes?"
links.text: What do you see in his eyes?

links.title: Empathy: "In his eyes? A half-familiar longin..."
links.text: In his eyes? A half-familiar longing.  Flecks of brown and gold.

links.title: You: "Familiar -- how?"
links.text: Familiar -- how?

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: "It's hard to say. His gaze wanders..."
links.text: It's hard to say. His gaze wanders southwest -- down the street that goes beyond the horizon...

links.title: Shivers: "The road continues for miles, flowi..."
links.text: The road continues for miles, flowing together with other roads, turning into causeways or bridges, ending suddenly in dead ends -- or ramping up or down highways. It forms a criss-cross pattern across the land...

links.title: You: "Where does it lead?"
links.text: Where does it lead?

links.title: Shivers: "Above the Jamrock Quarter, in the f..."
links.text: Above the Jamrock Quarter, in the form of a raised motorway, and then the never-ending sprawl of Faubourg. High above buildings new and old, the air filled with the rumble of motor engines.

links.title: You: "Further..."
links.text: Further...

links.title: Shivers: "To the Old-Old South, to the farthe..."
links.text: To the Old-Old South, to the farthest outskirts of Revachol. Through the chequered fields of farmland, upstream to the River Esperance, past Monte-Martin... The border approaches.

links.title: You: "What's beyond the border?"
links.text: What's beyond the border?

links.title: Shivers: "You cannot see. It's out of the cit..."
links.text: You cannot see. It's out of the city. Up ahead, the mist blocks all sight. A gale blows across your cheeks... it is cold. Before you stands a tall lorry driver with sad eyes.

links.title: You: "Blink rapidly."
links.text: Blink rapidly.

links.title: Shivers: "The road disappears, it is but a mi..."
links.text: The road disappears, it is but a mirage... before you stands a tall lorry driver with sad eyes.

links.title: You: "Shake off the daze."
links.text: Shake off the daze.

links.title: Shivers: "You may ignore the labyrinthine pat..."
links.text: You may ignore the labyrinthine pathways, but you will never be freed from them -- they are carved into your soul.

links.title: You: ""What's in the southwest?""
links.text: "What's in the southwest?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Excuse me?" He emerges from the re..."
links.text: "Excuse me?" He emerges from the reverie.

links.title: Composure: "A flinch jolts his frame. The quest..."
links.text: A flinch jolts his frame. The question has touched a nerve.

links.title: You: ""I'm a cop, I can fix anything.""
links.text: "I'm a cop, I can fix anything."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: "He chuckles. "There are things even..."
links.text: He chuckles. "There are things even a cop can't fix, my man. There's no helping an absence, you know?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I miss my family. They're all I ha..."
links.text: "I miss my family. They're all I have, my wife... a second kid on the way... waiting all the way in Deora. And here I am, stuck in this shit, so far from home."

links.title: You: ""Deora?""
links.text: "Deora?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Deora-of-the-Seven-Seas. It's on t..."
links.text: "Deora-of-the-Seven-Seas. It's on the other end of Le Caillou, pretty much -- on another island, called Laurentide, off mainland. We've got a little place there. I can almost hear my kid laugh, when it snows..."

links.title: You: ""What's it like to miss someone?""
links.text: "What's it like to miss someone?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""What's it *like*? Good. And bad. A..."
links.text: "What's it *like*? Good. And bad. An ache that brings you joy." He smiles warmly. "I think of them a lot. I dream up these silly scenarios, in great detail. Of living with them... it comforts me."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: "There's a pause and a sigh. Then he..."
links.text: There's a pause and a sigh. Then he turns his eyes to you. "What about you, cop-man? You missing someone?"

links.title: Inland Empire: "Is that what it is -- this feeling?"
links.text: Is that what it is -- this feeling?

links.title: Half Light: "No. It's scarier than that. You're..."
links.text: No. It's scarier than that. You're *pursued* by a hunter. Smelling of apricots and sorrow. And the past.

links.title: You: ""I miss my gun. I lost it.""
links.text: "I miss my gun. I lost it."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""You lost your gun? Oh man, that's..."
links.text: "You lost your gun? Oh man, that's bad news. Especially here, in Martinaise. I hope you find it soon before things turn foul."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""But... thanks for this. It's nice..."
links.text: "But... thanks for this. It's nice to talk to someone. And I know it wasn't easy to ask." He smiles. "I hope you find your way through your own troubles."

links.title: You: ""I'm *fine* man, I don't miss *anyo..."
links.text: "I'm *fine* man, I don't miss *anyone*."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I feel for you, my friend. It's go..."
links.text: "I feel for you, my friend. It's good to miss someone. I like it. Knowing there's something *more* than what I have with me here."

links.title: You: ""I miss someone but I don't know wh..."
links.text: "I miss someone but I don't know who it is."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I feel for you, my friend. It's ba..."
links.text: "I feel for you, my friend. It's bad enough to *know* who you miss... missing like that doesn't feel like it has much of an upside."

links.title: You: ""No. I feel *hunted*.""
links.text: "No. I feel *hunted*."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Hunted? By what?""
links.text: "Hunted? By what?"

links.title: You: ""By a shadowy figure known only to..."
links.text: "By a shadowy figure known only to me as the ex-something."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""An ex-wife?""
links.text: "An ex-wife?"

links.title: Pain Threshold: "A pain burns in your chest, radiati..."
links.text: A pain burns in your chest, radiating. A crown of arteries on fire.

links.title: You: ""Ex-wife? No. It's a sinister prese..."
links.text: "Ex-wife? No. It's a sinister presence that hunts me across all planes of existence."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Sinister presence? Wow... that sou..."
links.text: "Sinister presence? Wow... that sounds really bad. I hope that doesn't happen to my marriage."

links.title: You: ""First -- what *is* marriage?""
links.text: "First -- what *is* marriage?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Man, who even knows? It's like a l..."
links.text: "Man, who even knows? It's like a legal contract, but also a bond between spirits... Every one is different, that's all I can say."

links.title: You: ""It's definitely going to happen to..."
links.text: "It's definitely going to happen to your marriage too."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Maybe it is. We're doing our best..."
links.text: "Maybe it is. We're doing our best to keep ours together. I *hope* it's not, but you never know..." A pause. "Thanks for the dark words, I guess. I'll make sure they don't come true."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's good talking to someone. I kn..."
links.text: "It's good talking to someone. I know it wasn't easy to say those things, so..." He smiles. "I hope you find your way through your own troubles."

links.title: You: ""Don't worry. I'm certain nothing b..."
links.text: "Don't worry. I'm certain nothing bad is ever going to happen to your marriage."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah... In marriage you never know..."
links.text: "Yeah... In marriage you never know if you're doing the right thing. I *hope* we're doing our best to keep ours together, but -- anything can happen. Look, man..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Thanks for this. It's nice to talk..."
links.text: "Thanks for this. It's nice to talk to someone. I know it wasn't easy to ask, so...." He smiles. "I hope you find your way through your own troubles."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, my thing has got *nothing* t..."
links.text: "Yeah, my thing has got *nothing* to do with marriage."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Sure, man, if you say so..." It do..."
links.text: "Sure, man, if you say so..." It doesn't look like he believes you. "But look, man..."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Thanks for this. It's good to talk..."
links.text: "Thanks for this. It's good to talk to someone. I know it wasn't easy to ask, so...." He smiles. "I hope you find your way through your own troubles."

links.title: You: ""It followed me into this world whe..."
links.text: "It followed me into this world when I awoke. I think it may be a planar hunter."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Planar hunter? Wow... that sounds..."
links.text: "Planar hunter? Wow... that sounds really bad. I hope that doesn't happen to my marriage."

links.title: You: ""Yeah - no. It's more like a sound...."
links.text: "Yeah - no. It's more like a sound. A black reverb, that slipped into this reality along with me."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Black reverb? Wow... that sounds r..."
links.text: "Black reverb? Wow... that sounds really bad. I hope that doesn't happen to my marriage."

links.title: You: ""No, it's the great white ghost tha..."
links.text: "No, it's the great white ghost that eats the world."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""A great white ghost? Wow... that s..."
links.text: "A great white ghost? Wow... that sounds really bad. I hope that doesn't happen to my marriage."

links.title: You: ""Whatever it is, one thing is for s..."
links.text: "Whatever it is, one thing is for sure -- it's *not* my ex-wife."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Still -- a shadowy figure. That so..."
links.text: "Still -- a shadowy figure. That sounds pretty bad. I hope that doesn't happen to my marriage..."

links.title: Drama: "For some reason, sire, he pays no h..."
links.text: For some reason, sire, he pays no heed to your objection. Continuing instead as if it *were* your ex wife. Strange...

links.title: You: ""Yeah, actually not. Let's change t..."
links.text: "Yeah, actually not. Let's change the subject."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Sure man, no problem... and thanks..."
links.text: "Sure man, no problem... and thanks for this. It's good to talk to someone. I know it wasn't easy to ask." He smiles. "I hope you find your way through your own troubles."

links.title: Empathy: "Perhaps it would be a good idea to..."
links.text: Perhaps it would be a good idea to show *yourself* some of that empathy, from time to time? Just a suggestion. Carry on now.

links.title: You: ""Really, you can tell me.""
links.text: "Really, you can tell me."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Man." He sighs. "I don't know what..."
links.text: "Man." He sighs. "I don't know what to say. Not much anyone can do... there's no helping an absence, you know?"

links.title: You: ""Hell, I get longing. I've felt som..."
links.text: "Hell, I get longing. I've felt something similar since I woke up."

links.title: Empathy: "Ease into it, don't go too far. Thi..."
links.text: Ease into it, don't go too far. This seems like a personal matter...

links.title: You: ""Man, you look sad. What's going on..."
links.text: "Man, you look sad. What's going on with you?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I'm okay, man. Just... the jam's g..."
links.text: "I'm okay, man. Just... the jam's got me down. The fumes, the chemical rainbows, the tarpaulin stretched on the frames and the dull engines off..." The man recedes into his daze of words.

links.title: Empathy: "Maybe the *full on* direct approach..."
links.text: Maybe the *full on* direct approach wasn't correct? Damn, it's tricky business looking into someone's eyes and not doing it *wrong*.

links.title: You: ""Hey, Tommy -- spill the beans. Wha..."
links.text: "Hey, Tommy -- spill the beans. What's troubling you?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Man, nothing's troubling me. Just..."
links.text: "Man, nothing's troubling me. Just the usual lorryman tropes and hopes: the road and the rhymes. This jam ain't helping either..." He looks around.

links.title: Empathy: "That all the beans you got, Tommy?..."
links.text: That all the beans you got, Tommy? Damn. It really is hard to *talk* man to man...

links.title: You: ""MY MAN, I WANNA KNOW ABOUT YOUR SO..."
links.text: "MY MAN, I WANNA KNOW ABOUT YOUR SOUL!"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Cool, cool... We all want to know..."
links.text: "Cool, cool... We all want to know each other, know each other's woes and all -- but people, man, they have *slippery* souls..."

links.title: Empathy: "Just like that -- he slips out of y..."
links.text: Just like that -- he slips out of your reach. It is possible the YELLING didn't help.

links.title: You: "He's a poet. Hit him with your best..."
links.text: He's a poet. Hit him with your best verse.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Wait, there's something *here*. Sto..."
links.text: Wait, there's something *here*. Stored away in some dusty corner. It starts like...

links.title: You: ""A mirrors temperature is always z..."
links.text: "A mirrors temperature is always zero. It is ice in the veins. Its camera is an x-ray."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Whoa." He leans in, his eyes brigh..."
links.text: "Whoa." He leans in, his eyes bright with attention. "What else?"

links.title: You: ""It is a chalice held out to you in..."
links.text: "It is a chalice held out to you in silent communion."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Silent communion, that's good..."..."
links.text: "Silent communion, that's good..." He's transfixed by the words.

links.title: You: ""Where gaspingly you partake of a s..."
links.text: "Where gaspingly you partake of a shifting identity never your own."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Dang," he grunts, unable to suppre..."
links.text: "Dang," he grunts, unable to suppress his reaction. "That's some *great* shit. You came up with that yourself?"

links.title: Inland Empire: "*Did* you?"
links.text: *Did* you?

links.title: Drama: "Or did you learn it in school? More..."
links.text: Or did you learn it in school? More importantly: who can prove if you did? Go with it -- you *deserve* some acclaim.

links.title: You: ""I don't... really know.""
links.text: "I don't... really know."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""No matter. Great verse is like tha..."
links.text: "No matter. Great verse is like that sometimes -- ephemeral. You might not look it, but seems you have some literary chops. Maybe there's hope for me yet!"

links.title: You: ""That's... a strange compliment.""
links.text: "That's... a strange compliment."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Just messin' with you. It's cool,..."
links.text: "Just messin' with you. It's cool, you're an okay guy, for a cop."

links.title: You: ""I think that may be an actual poet..."
links.text: "I think that may be an actual poet. And I've learned it by heart."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""No matter, it's a fine stanza. You..."
links.text: "No matter, it's a fine stanza. You're not so bad after all, for a cop."

links.title: You: ""For a cop?""
links.text: "For a cop?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""They're more often into fists than..."
links.text: "They're more often into fists than rhymes, see. Let alone *honesty in verse*."

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "In a small office behind the Old Mi..."
links.text: In a small office behind the Old Military Hospital, hunched under the green glow of his desk light, officer Hans Blau browses through a test print. Of his futurist magazine. It's called "The Futurist". The typeface on the header is too small...

links.title: You: ""Any organization gets all kind of..."
links.text: "Any organization gets all kind of folk. I'm sure we try our best."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant looks at you in sile..."
links.text: The lieutenant looks at you in silence, a curious look in his eyes, nodding slightly.

links.title: You: ""I'm doing what little I can to do..."
links.text: "I'm doing what little I can to do right by people."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Well. You've given *me* some hope,..."
links.text: "Well. You've given *me* some hope, I guess!" He gives you a thumbs up.

links.title: Inland Empire: "You've found some common ground wit..."
links.text: You've found some common ground with this man. Even impressed him. The next time you look in the *mirror*, though. Remember those words...

links.title: You: ""No joke, man. Fuck the police.""
links.text: "No joke, man. Fuck the police."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant closes his eyes and..."
links.text: The lieutenant closes his eyes and lets slip a loud, long sigh.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Umm... if you say so, officer." He..."
links.text: "Umm... if you say so, officer." He gives you a cautious thumbs up.

links.title: You: ""I'm just a vessel for the muse.""
links.text: "I'm just a vessel for the muse."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Right. But really -- no bullshit...."
links.text: "Right. But really -- no bullshit. That's great stuff. I sorta wanna know if it's yours..."

links.title: You: ""I think the words are mine, yes.""
links.text: "I think the words are mine, yes."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Fuckin' A! Seems I got you all wro..."
links.text: "Fuckin' A! Seems I got you all wrong. Cops aren't much known for their artistic sensibilities these days."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's good to meet a fellow poet --..."
links.text: "It's good to meet a fellow poet -- someone with an appreciation for *real text*. The others here, see, they don't really *get* it."

links.title: Authority: "What gall he had to admonish you ea..."
links.text: What gall he had to admonish you earlier for your prejudice, yet here he is, saying cops are usually dull-minded. Are you going to let him get away with being a hypocrite?

links.title: You: ""It makes it all easier to bare. If..."
links.text: "It makes it all easier to bare. If the words are *pretty*."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I get ya. When they really *click*..."
links.text: "I get ya. When they really *click* it makes the world seem manageable. Good to be on the same page." He gives you a thumbs up.

links.title: You: ""Hey, man. Cops are human too.""
links.text: "Hey, man. Cops are human too."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah. I guess I owe you an apology..."
links.text: "Yeah. I guess I owe you an apology for thinking otherwise. And again -- *great* shit." He gives you a thumbs up.

links.title: Conceptualization: "No. Just no. I can already see it's..."
links.text: No. Just no. I can already see it's failed and I'm *stopping* it now. Until you have *good* poetry -- you have *no* poetry.

links.title: Volition: "This guy has amazing willpower. Hon..."
links.text: This guy has amazing willpower. Honestly, he's the only one of that *intellectual* bunch I trust.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Your *best* verse? You don't even h..."
links.text: Your *best* verse? You don't even have a *bad* verse in here. Just tumbleweed and liquor stains... wait, no! What are you DOING?!

links.title: You: ""'She broke me. She fucking broke m..."
links.text: "'She broke me. She fucking broke me.'"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""That's brutal, man. But, you know...."
links.text: "That's brutal, man. But, you know... Time will..."

links.title: Conceptualization: "No! Stop! He's already mortified."
links.text: No! Stop! He's already mortified.

links.title: You: ""No, Tommy. These are my rhymes. Li..."
links.text: "No, Tommy. These are my rhymes. Listen!" (Continue.) "'She *fucked* me 'til I bled.'"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""That's... uhm...""
links.text: "That's... uhm..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In the name of *god*, what are you..."
links.text: "In the name of *god*, what are you doing?"

links.title: You: ""It's not real guys. It's not my ac..."
links.text: "It's not real guys. It's not my actual thoughts. It's a poem."

links.title: You: ""It's not real, man. It's not my ac..."
links.text: "It's not real, man. It's not my actual thoughts. It's a poem."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah, yeah, I get that and it's co..."
links.text: "Yeah, yeah, I get that and it's cool. But..."

links.title: You: "(Continue.) "I will never be the sa..."
links.text: (Continue.) "I will never be the same again. She's always there. Fuck the case. Fuck everything. Total doom."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah..." He doesn't know what to s..."
links.text: "Yeah..." He doesn't know what to say, so he just repeats: "Yeah-yeah. I get it. These are *your* rhymes, they're from your life. Doesn't matter if they're robust, they're honest. So... thanks man."

links.title: Drama: "He's not lying. He liked the end."
links.text: He's not lying. He liked the end.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. And I also thank you -- for *..."
links.text: "Yes. And I also thank you -- for *stopping*." He looks at you. "We have a drug investigation to return to. How about we do that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. And I also thank you -- for s..."
links.text: "Yes. And I also thank you -- for stopping. We have a murder investigation to return to. How about we do that?"

links.title: You: ""That's all for now, bye." [Leave.]"
links.text: "That's all for now, bye." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""I'm good for now, good talk." [Lea..."
links.text: "I'm good for now, good talk." [Leave.]

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah..." He makes a half-hearted s..."
links.text: "Yeah..." He makes a half-hearted salute.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Don't be a stranger." He gives a s..."
links.text: "Don't be a stranger." He gives a salute with two fingers.

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Now it's turning into a... kind of..."
dialogueTree.text: "Now it's turning into a... kind of a..." He searches for the right expression. "Snow limbo, man. What's on your mind?"

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Make way for the master poet!" He..."
dialogueTree.text: "Make way for the master poet!" He greets you with a nod.

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Still here, stuck in this damn jam..."
dialogueTree.text: "Still here, stuck in this damn jam, my man." The man greets you with a smile. "What's up?"

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Hello again, my man." He greets yo..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again, my man." He greets you. "What's on your mind?"

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Welcome back!" He gives you a know..."
dialogueTree.text: "Welcome back!" He gives you a knowing nod. "The days ain't going by any faster, believe me."

links.title: You: ""So how long have you been here?""
links.text: "So how long have you been here?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Feels like forever, like I was bor..."
links.text: "Feels like forever, like I was born on this here roundabout and this was all I ever knew. Just me and the metal and the tyres, the oil and the fumes of mazut..."

links.title: Drama: "Mazut is an antiquated term for hea..."
links.text: Mazut is an antiquated term for heavy fuel oils -- this man has a barely suppressed performative streak. Or he just likes unusual words. Or both!

links.title: You: ""I dig your style, man.""
links.text: "I dig your style, man."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah, imagine -- it's been a whole..."
links.text: "Yeah, imagine -- it's been a whole week already." He snickers.

links.title: Empathy: "Behind the laugh, however, a touch..."
links.text: Behind the laugh, however, a touch of sorrow.

links.title: You: ""Extravagantly phrased -- but I can..."
links.text: "Extravagantly phrased -- but I can roll with it."

links.title: You: ""I don't quite understand what you..."
links.text: "I don't quite understand what you just said."

links.title: You: ""Could you say it again, only a lit..."
links.text: "Could you say it again, only a little less plodding?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Everyone's a critic, man." He wave..."
links.text: "Everyone's a critic, man." He waves you off. "It's okay. I've been here a whole week already."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""So, tell me... what do you need?""
links.text: "So, tell me... what do you need?"

links.title: You: ""Cool." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Cool." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Back already?" He grins at you."

links.title: You: ""I am the law.""
links.text: "I am the law."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""You sure are, my man." He nods emp..."
links.text: "You sure are, my man." He nods emphatically.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Everyone understands you're *the l..."
links.text: "Everyone understands you're *the law*. That's why you have that insignia on your arm. So you don't have to keep saying it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, people get that you are *the..."
links.text: "Yes, people get that you are *the law*. You really don't have to keep saying it."

links.title: You: ""What's going on here?""
links.text: "What's going on here?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's the Jam, my man." He motions..."
links.text: "It's the Jam, my man." He motions toward the sprawl of lorries with a sweeping gesture.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The air from the east is thick with..."
links.text: The air from the east is thick with the smell of crude oils, heavy metals and other by-products of the modern era. You can almost *taste* it.

links.title: You: ""What's the Jam?""
links.text: "What's the Jam?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's a traffic jam for the ages. H..."
links.text: "It's a traffic jam for the ages. Harbour gates up the street are shut tight. No explanation given. Workers on strike. Scabs agitatin'. An all-around clusterfuck."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Meanwhile, we're all stuck here in..."
links.text: "Meanwhile, we're all stuck here in long haul limbo for days upon days upon days..." He glances south, down the road. "Upon days."

links.title: You: ""*Limbo*, huh? So that's where I am.""
links.text: "*Limbo*, huh? So that's where I am."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah, yeah -- exactly.""
links.text: "Yeah, yeah -- exactly."

links.title: Conceptualization: "It's official. He too agrees. This..."
links.text: It's official. He too agrees. This is the antechamber of the afterlife.

links.title: You: ""Never mind." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Never mind." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I am a gander and a hunter and a g..."
dialogueTree.text: "I am a gander and a hunter and a gatherer, feel like a traveller..." The man mutters to himself, accenting the beats as he goes.

links.title: Conceptualization: "A simple little cadence. He seems t..."
links.text: A simple little cadence. He seems to be making it up as he goes.

links.title: You: "Keep listening."
links.text: Keep listening.

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""From another... planet," he finish..."
links.text: "From another... planet," he finishes and turns to you: "Hey there."

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""My man, you're alive!" He assesses..."
dialogueTree.text: "My man, you're alive!" He assesses the situation. "Almost... kind of... sort of alive."

links.title: You: ""Alive and limping.""
links.text: "Alive and limping."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Man, what a day... I missed out on..."
links.text: "Man, what a day... I missed out on most of the action, but I heard it was quite the encounter." He nods thoughtfully. "Had a strong sense of *finality* to it."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""So what's next? You headin' back t..."
links.text: "So what's next? You headin' back to Jamrock now? Talk is local Union muscle were behind it all, I'd reckon the case is closed... even if it kinda turned into a shitshow."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, the case seems kind of done...."
links.text: "Yeah, the case seems kind of done. Gonna check on a few last things."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Good luck with that, my man. Ain't..."
links.text: "Good luck with that, my man. Ain't easy being you, but hey, you're still breathin', right?"

links.title: You: ""By the way, you're not angry with..."
links.text: "By the way, you're not angry with me anymore?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Fuck it," he shrugs. "I'm a bad gu..."
links.text: "Fuck it," he shrugs. "I'm a bad guy now. There's things more important than holding a grudge. It's okay -- you've been through enough."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""We are what we are. And you're a c..."
links.text: "We are what we are. And you're a cop."

links.title: You: ""Right. A few questions before I go.""
links.text: "Right. A few questions before I go."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Shoot." He pauses, then chuckles a..."
links.text: "Shoot." He pauses, then chuckles all of a sudden. "Sorry man, didn't mean it like that. Ask away."

links.title: You: ""I'll be heading off then." [Leave...."
links.text: "I'll be heading off then." [Leave.]

links.title: You: ""I'm still looking around. Loose th..."
links.text: "I'm still looking around. Loose threads to tie up."

links.title: You: ""It wasn't the local Union muscle,..."
links.text: "It wasn't the local Union muscle, by the way."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Hey, that's just what I heard. Old..."
links.text: "Hey, that's just what I heard. Old wives' tale. So -- what next?"

links.title: You: ""I've been better.""
links.text: "I've been better."

links.title: You: ""It hurts like hell, man.""
links.text: "It hurts like hell, man."

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Oh look..." As you approach he ins..."
dialogueTree.text: "Oh look..." As you approach he instinctively averts his eyes. "It's the cop who turned me into a bad person."

dialogueTree.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""I... uh... saw you poking around i..."
dialogueTree.text: "I... uh... saw you poking around in lady driver's lorry. She in trouble?"

links.title: You: ""Wait -- so you *know* the lady dri..."
links.text: "Wait -- so you *know* the lady driver?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""A little. She's okay. Troubled but..."
links.text: "A little. She's okay. Troubled but -- a nice person. She left last week. Left me the keys to park her lorry if the jam should break."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What else do you know about her?""
links.text: "What else do you know about her?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Nothing, man. We just talked a bit..."
links.text: "Nothing, man. We just talked a bit -- about life and stuff..." He looks to you. "So, is she in trouble or what?"

links.title: You: ""Wait -- so you *did* know somethin..."
links.text: "Wait -- so you *did* know something about who's smuggling drugs around here?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Nah, man, I was telling you the tr..."
links.text: "Nah, man, I was telling you the truth. I really didn't think it'd be her. She's okay. Sorta troubled but, still -- a nice person."

links.title: Empathy: "So that's what that emotion was, be..."
links.text: So that's what that emotion was, before. It was *wishful thinking*.

links.title: Drama: "So that's what that emotion was, be..."
links.text: So that's what that emotion was, before. It was *wishful thinking*.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What else do you know about her?""
links.text: "What else do you know about her?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Nothing. We just talked a bit -- a..."
links.text: "Nothing. We just talked a bit -- about life and stuff. She left me her keys, so I can park her lorry if the jam broke..." He looks to you. "So, is she in trouble or what?"

links.title: You: ""The racist told us where her cabin..."
links.text: "The racist told us where her cabin is. We only searched it."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Still better than me, I guess -- t..."
links.text: "Still better than me, I guess -- told you there's plenty of others who'd tell on her." He leans in. "But... is she in trouble?"

links.title: You: ""No trouble. She's going to be fine.""
links.text: "No trouble. She's going to be fine."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Oh man, that's like... a load off..."
links.text: "Oh man, that's like... a load off my mind. All that stress was messing up my rhymes."

links.title: Drama: "He chooses to believe what's best f..."
links.text: He chooses to believe what's best for her.

links.title: You: ""What's the plan with those rhymes..."
links.text: "What's the plan with those rhymes anyway?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Oh, you know..." The thought light..."
links.text: "Oh, you know..." The thought lightens him up. "Tommy Le Homme's gonna be a musician. *Sprechgesang*, but with beats. I've got lot of free time on the road to hone my craft."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The correct grammar is Tommy *L'Hom..."
links.text: The correct grammar is Tommy *L'Homme*.

links.title: You: ""Why Tommy Le Homme?""
links.text: "Why Tommy Le Homme?"

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Tommy L'Homme was taken." He shrug..."
links.text: "Tommy L'Homme was taken." He shrugs in a what-can-you-do manner. "My real name is Jerry Lefitte -- Tommy's way better."

links.title: Empathy: "It's more *him*."
links.text: It's more *him*.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Jerry is a cool name."
links.text: Jerry is a cool name.

links.title: You: ""Alright. I had another question ac..."
links.text: "Alright. I had another question actually."

links.title: You: ""Good luck with that. Gotta run." [..."
links.text: "Good luck with that. Gotta run." [Leave.]

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah -- you too. Be safe, detectiv..."
links.text: "Yeah -- you too. Be safe, detective."

links.title: You: ""There's going to be an investigati..."
links.text: "There's going to be an investigation."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""It's that bad?" He lets out a whis..."
links.text: "It's that bad?" He lets out a whistle, looking about ten years older suddenly. "Man, what should I do... what should I do to help her?"

links.title: You: ""No need for you to do anything, do..."
links.text: "No need for you to do anything, don't worry. The police are looking into it."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Yeah, maybe I should just keep my..."
links.text: "Yeah, maybe I should just keep my head down... and work on my rhymes while I can."

links.title: You: ""The last thing we need is more civ..."
links.text: "The last thing we need is more civilians involved."

links.title: You: ""I really don't know. ""
links.text: "I really don't know. "

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Damn, I always warned her to watch..."
links.text: "Damn, I always warned her to watch herself... man, nothing to do now, I guess."

links.title: Tommy Le Homme: ""Maybe I should just keep my head d..."
links.text: "Maybe I should just keep my head down and work on my rhymes while I can."

links.title: You: ""Sorry, man. I can't disclose the f..."
links.text: "Sorry, man. I can't disclose the facts of an official investigation to you."
